attributes.action: Keep gyms open for all lockdowns
attributes.additional_details: Government and parliment are the people who have enforced this so they can stop it from happening currently and in the future.
attributes.background: Gyms are essential to people's mental health and over all fitness. They keep people in routines and help relieve pressure on the NHS by keeping people healthy. Sending a message to the nation that keeping takeaways open as they are 'essential' instead of gyms is disgusting.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Keep gyms and leisure facilities open during any lockdown: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/556956

Prevent gyms closing due to a spike in Covid 19 cases: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/333869

The Committee will be holding a debate on Covid-19 restrictions on gyms and sport on Monday 23 November. You will be able to watch the debate on Parliament TV at 4.30pm: https://www.parliamentlive.tv/Commons
